name: Perennial Paraphernalia
description:
Grow a trowel to start farming wheat and potatoes!

Game made for the LowRezJam 2022.

Escape closes Inventory and Shop.

Shortcuts:

I - Inventory

E - Shop

Note: Linux and MacOS builds not tested.

For web build, reload page to restart. For downloaded, close and reopen application. There is no data saving right now, but I hope to add that soon. I might continue this project for a little bit after the jam.

I made the pixel art, the font, and the music. The instrument is a steel tongue drum.
